pkgmetadata.longdescription: xsystem4 is a cross-platform, open-source implementation of AliceSoft's System 4 game engine. It allows running modern AliceSoft visual novels and games that use the System 4 engine on Linux and other platforms. The engine supports advanced features including 3D graphics, video playback, and complex scripting.

use.flag: Enable Chibi Scheme debugger support for game development and troubleshooting
Use OpenGL ES 2.0 backend instead of desktop OpenGL for better compatibility on embedded systems
